name: Pixel Arena (nelexium)
description:
Pixel Arena is a fast-paced action 2D shooter that is made in GameMaker and is in active development.

Momentarily, the game only has a ENDLESS gamemode, that ramps up in difficulty the longer you play, but a STORY mode will be added if everything goes well.

Feedback is super appreciated! Please tell me how the game feels and looks below.

CONTORLS:

MouseAim
Left ClickAttack / Shoot
Right ClickAim down sights (only works on pistol for now)A and DLeft and RightSpaceJumpShiftDash (only works while jumping!)1, 2Sword, Pistol (more weapons are going to be added)

Thank you for taking the time playing the game.

-nelexium
